original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says: Listen! I have become your enemy, Tyre. I will bring many nations to attack you. They will be like the waves of the sea as they hit you.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 두로야 내가 너를 대적하여 바다가 그 파도를 굽이치게 함 같이 여러 민족들이 와서 너를 치게 하리니

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says:
I have become your enemy, Tyre.
I will bring many nations to attack you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여러 나라를 이끌고 너를 치게 하리라.

sentences.original_text: They will be like the waves of the sea as they hit you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 칠 때 바다 파도와 같이 되리라.
